Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.rmi

Class RmiConnection

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.rmi.RmiConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Connection
public final class RmiConnection
extends Object
implements Connection
The RmiConnection class supports the communication towards a remote actor space taking advantage of RMI software.

  • Constructor Summary

    Class constructor.

    Forwards a message to a remote actor.

    • RmiConnection

      public RmiConnection​(Reference r, RmiProxy p)
      Class constructor.
      Parameters:
      r - the actor space service provider reference of the destination actor space.
      p - the RMI remote proxy.

  • Method Details

    • getDestination

      public Reference getDestination()
      Gets the actor space service provider reference identifying the remote actor space.
      Specified by:
      getDestination in interface Connection
      Returns:
      the reference.

    • forward

      public boolean forward​(Message m)
      Forwards a message to a remote actor. Of course, the actor should be reachable through such a connection.
      Specified by:
      forward in interface Connection
      Parameters:
      m - the message.
      Returns:
      true if the operation is successful.
